Posts.Content: Regarding Les comment: I have just been diagnosed with breast cancer and have received a bone scan it is there too. Just received my first chemo session on Friday and feeling a little unsure of everything. Hope all goes well for your bone scan!
Posts.Title: breast cancer that has led to bone cancer
